title: Gallo Role
body: Is Galio a better top laner or mid laner?

replies.body: I personally feel like he's a better top laner, but to each his own! You should hit up the Gameplay boards to get more responses on this type of question though!
Thanks for the response! I'll post in game play boards next time.
I prefer him mid lane, because he has inherent magic resist on his kit to each his own tho :)
